title: viTTala salahO
sahitya:
viTTala salahO svAmi nimmanu viTTala jagadantaryAmi


caraNam 1    hindE viTTalA mundE viTTalA hindE mundE purandara viTTalA
    caraNam 2    eDage viTTalaA balakE viTTalA edage balakE purandara viTTalA
    caraNam 3    mEle viTTalA kalage viTTalA mElekalage purandara viTTalA
    caraNam 4    oLage viTTalA horage viTTala oLage horage purandara viTTala
    caraNam 5    tande viTTala tAyi viTTalA tandetAyi purandara viTTalA
    caraNam 6    bandhu viTTala baLage viTTalE bandhubaLage purandara viTTalA
